See also: film

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From English film.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Film m (genitive Films or Filmes, plural Filme, diminutive Filmchen n)

  1. film (a thin layer of some substance)
  2. (photography) photographic film
  3. motion picture

Declension[edit]

Declension of Film
singularplural
indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinderFilmdieFilme
genitiveeinesdesFilmes,
Films		derFilme
dativeeinemdemFilm,
Filme1		denFilmen
accusativeeinendenFilmdieFilme
1Now uncommon, see notes

Luxembourgish[edit]

Noun[edit]

Film m (plural Filmer)

  1. photographic film
  2. motion picture
  3. film, thin layer
